title: I am Debate-ably the worst player in platinub Elo (self claimed + other people have claimed) AMA

replies.body: No way. I've seen far worse plats than you. Some plats that amaze me that they aren't bronze 5.
i lost to a bronze 5 Anivia as Riven. This Anivia was not a smurf.
What would you say if a telemarketer called you right now?

Depends what the telemarketer was selling. If it was something cute like a S toy or something I'd consider buying. If the person calling sounded like a cute indian girl I would ask them out and consider living the rest of my life with a hot indian waifu.
Ask away? How do you feel about BEEEEEES?!?!?!{{item:3101}}

I have been stung twice in my life (maybe only once because the first time i only saw a little black thing in my toe when i stood on something and i didnt have my glasses on and couldnt see what it was properly and it itched like crazy for the next month and puffed up a bit.) 2nd time i dont remember but it did happen, i think i stood on another 1. 

To answer your question they  hurt and I am afraid of them.
